title: Neurological, metabolic and inflammatory phenotypes in a mouse model of ECHS1 deficiency.
abstract: ECHS1 deficiency (ECHS1D) is a rare and devastating neurometabolic disease that currently has no defined treatments. This disorder results from missense loss-of-function mutations in the
